theory.introduction: Loops are used to run the same block of code multiple times. A `for` loop is useful when you know how many times to repeat.
theory.explanation: `range()` gives a sequence of numbers. `for` loops go through each number and run the code inside the block.
keyPoints: Use `range(n)` to repeat n times (from 0 to n-1)
The variable in the loop changes each time
`for i in range(n):` is a common pattern
